title: The Titans Upset the Bills, the Ravens Roll the Chargers, and How Good Is Trevon Diggs?
description:
Jason, James, and Ryan start by discussing the Ravens’ dominating performance over the Chargers (2:25). Then they have a conversation about Trevon Diggs’s play so far this season (19:22). They finish up by discussing the Titans’ upset win on Monday night over the Bills and the Packers’ road win over the Bears (29:58).

Hosts: Jason Goff, James Jones, and Ryan Shazier
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Assistance: Arjuna Ramgopal
